text: Goldie is a 1931 American romantic comedy movie directed by Benjamin Stoloff and was a remake of the 1928 movie A Girl in Every Port. It stars Jean Harlow, Spencer Tracy, Warren Hymer and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Benjamin Stoloff
title: Goldie
